title: China invests in tech: Implications and opportunities
itunes:title: China invests in tech: Implications and opportunities
description: Many countries are investing heavily in technology to compete with the US and other global players, and China tops the list. In this podcast, we discuss where—and why—China is making investments and the implications for relations between the US and China. We’ll also examine the impact on multinational companies in the TMT industry.
